title: Oster Extra-Large Air Fryer Oven, 10-in-1 Versatile Cooking Functions, Fits 2 Large Pizzas, Stainless Steel, Perfect for Holiday Hosting
description: Welcome to the world of air frying and more with Oster's Extra-Large Air Fryer Oven. This 10-in-1 countertop wonder can function as an air fryer, toaster, oven, and so much more, while being spacious enough to fit 2 large pizzas or two full chickens simultaneously. With its easy-to-use digital controls and a powerful fan for faster air circulation, you'll achieve the perfect crispiness with little to no oil. Whether you prefer to manually set the 90-minute timer or choose from the 10 presets including Air Fry, Toast, Broil, and TenderRoast, enjoy precise cooking times and temperatures every time.
